description: This file defines a PortfolioTab widget for a Flutter application, which displays financial portfolio information, holdings, and interactive dialogs for simulations and passive income calculations. It also includes internal classes for these dialogs and UI components.

classes.name: PortfolioTab
classes.description: Main widget that displays portfolio summary, holdings, and action options.

classes.name: _ActionTile
classes.description: Reusable widget for action buttons linking to dialogs or other screens.

classes.name: _SimulatorDialog
classes.description: Dialog for simulating wealth growth based on user input parameters.

classes.name: _IncomeDialog
classes.description: Dialog for calculating passive income from invested amount and yield.

methods.name: _simulate
methods.description: Performs a mock simulation of wealth growth based on input values.

methods.name: _calc
methods.description: Calculates passive income estimates based on invested amount and yield.

methods.name: dispose
methods.description: Disposes of text controllers to free resources.

calls: Style for color based on s.pnlDaily >= 0
Style for color based on s.pnlTotal >= 0
